name: Team 11 - IRIDESCENT
description:
The shaft is collapsing, get out ! You might be a seasonned miner, but digging too deep got you into trouble...your mine is collapsing ! Jump from one platform to another to escape the landslide, and make sure to always clear the way or you'll end up stuck ! Move fast !

In order to avoid falling rocks, you will have to find the next platform to jump to. Make sure to find it quickly ! Then, use the corresponding key to reach the desired platform in time.

Clear the way !

Sometimes, boulders will block your keys, and constrain you.  Do it the miner way ! Use your pickaxe to destroy them, and get unstuck while you still can !

Controls ! Team Game Design

Simon DEJEAN

Virgile VAZEILLE

Game Art

Nicolas WILLEM

Gaëtan LANCEMENT

Programming
